duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and guide Systems Engineering Managers to support Systems Engineers in driving growth within Major Accounts.
Drive enterprise-wide sales-related initiatives within Major Accounts and achieve revenue generation, individual, team, and organizational quotas.
Provide valuable insight into industry trends, customer challenges, technical evolutions, and business changes to help customers make security decisions.
Develop and execute outcome-oriented Systems Engineering initiatives to drive pipeline and sales with the AVP, RVPs, SEMs, and SEs.
Lead portfolio expansion initiatives, upselling subscriptions, and strategic solutions.
Operate effectively in a matrix manner with extended teams and act as an escalation point for technical issues within the territory.
Develop, mentor, manage, and support reporting sales engineers with technical and organizational leadership.
Manage successful evaluations and timely return of evaluation equipment.

education_certification.credential: A minimum combination of 8 years of first and/or second line, Systems Engineering management experience preferred.
